talk.author: did:plc:bqqmoom6eiznml3kcln47ftd
talk.utter: The ban-wave was likely the result of one of those recent Kiwifarms or 8Chan campaigns against BSky.

talk.author: did:plc:tja4tn2rh54ccuqs42aho62k
talk.utter: I got blocked by another account for pointing this out.

talk.author: did:plc:bqqmoom6eiznml3kcln47ftd
talk.utter:
Funny, KiwiFarms keeps following my account with their latest account for pointing this out.   I promptly report and block them.

They are on the list of groups I do not tolerate.

talk.author: did:plc:bqqmoom6eiznml3kcln47ftd
talk.utter: I think they have keyword bots.  I'm glad to report their shit.

talk.utter:
Funny, KiwiFarms keeps following my account with their latest account for pointing this out.   I promptly report and block them.

talk.author: did:plc:bqqmoom6eiznml3kcln47ftd

talk.author: did:plc:tja4tn2rh54ccuqs42aho62k
talk.utter: As someone that used to be active there as a teenager before accepting my asexuality (keyword: used), I can tell you they're unfortunately not idiots with stuff like that. They embrace their infamy like a trophy. That's why I avoid referring to them by name publicly.

talk.author: did:plc:bqqmoom6eiznml3kcln47ftd
talk.utter:
BTW, they are not stupid or ignorant. 

They are bigoted, hateful and obsessive.  They are also incredibly rash and quick to act without fully thinking things out.   

However, enough of them are dangerously intelligent when combined with these things.

This goes for both "banned from 4chan groups."

talk.author: did:plc:bqqmoom6eiznml3kcln47ftd
talk.utter: We need to come up with derogatory nicknames to give each of them.  They need to be highly modifiable and adaptable to prevent keyword search for them.
